mapper.select: SELECT a.ATCH_FILE_ID, b.FILE_CN, b.FILE_SN, b.FILE_STRE_COURS, b.STRE_FILE_NM, b.FILE_EXTSN, b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, b.FILE_SIZE, a.CREAT_DT FROM COMTNFILE a, COMTNFILEDETAIL b WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId} AND a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID AND a.USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY b.FILE_SN
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNFILE (ATCH_FILE_ID, CREAT_DT, USE_AT, CREAT_ID) VALUES ( #{atchFileId}, SYSDATE(), 'Y', #{creatId})

INSERT INTO COMTNFILEDETAIL ( ATCH_FILE_ID, FILE_SN, FILE_STRE_COURS, STRE_FILE_NM, ORIGNL_FILE_NM, FILE_EXTSN, FILE_SIZE, FILE_CN, FILE_GUBUN ) VALUES ( #{atchFileId}, #{fileSn}, #{fileStreCours}, #{streFileNm}, #{orignlFileNm}, #{fileExtsn}, #{fileMg}, #{fileCn}, #{fileGubun} )
mapper.select: SELECT ATCH_FILE_ID, FILE_CN, FILE_SN, FILE_STRE_COURS, STRE_FILE_NM, FILE_EXTSN, ORIGNL_FILE_NM, FILE_SIZE FROM COMTNFILEDETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId} AND FILE_SN = #{fileSn}

SELECT a.ATCH_FILE_ID, b.FILE_CN, b.FILE_SN, b.FILE_STRE_COURS, b.STRE_FILE_NM, b.FILE_EXTSN, b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, b.FILE_SIZE, a.CREAT_DT FROM COMTNFILE a, COMTNFILEDETAIL b WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID AND a.USE_AT = 'Y'
AND b.STRE_FILE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
ORDER BY a.ATCH_FILE_ID, b.FILE_SN LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(a.ATCH_FILE_ID) FROM COMTNFILE a, COMTNFILEDETAIL b WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID AND a.USE_AT = 'Y'
AND b.STRE_FILE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')

SELECT a.ATCH_FILE_ID, b.FILE_CN, b.FILE_SN, b.FILE_STRE_COURS, b.STRE_FILE_NM, b.FILE_EXTSN, b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, b.FILE_SIZE, a.CREAT_DT FROM COMTNFILE a, COMTNFILEDETAIL b WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId} AND a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID AND UPPER(b.FILE_EXTSN) IN ('GIF','JPG','BMP','PNG') AND a.USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY b.FILE_SN

SELECT a.ATCH_FILE_ID AS seleceKey, b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM AS selectValue FROM COMTNFILE a, COMTNFILEDETAIL b, RD_WEEK_INFO c WHERE 1=1
AND b.FILE_GUBUN = 'WEEK' AND a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID AND a.ATCH_FILE_ID = c.ATCH_FILE_ID AND c.FIX_DAY IS null AND a.USE_AT = 'Y'
/* 협력사 조건 */ AND c.COOPERATOR_ID IN ( SELECT COOPERATOR_ID FROM RD_COOPERATOR WHERE REGISTRATION_SN = #{schIhidNum} )
ORDER BY a.CREAT_DT DESC

SELECT a.ATCH_FILE_ID AS seleceKey, b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM AS selectValue FROM COMTNFILE a, COMTNFILEDETAIL b, RD_WEEK_INFO c, RD_WEEK_INFO_OUT d WHERE 1=1
AND b.FILE_GUBUN = 'WEEK' AND a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID AND a.ATCH_FILE_ID = c.ATCH_FILE_ID AND c.FIX_DAY IS not null AND c.week_id = d.week_id AND (c.ACCOUNTS_ST_DT BETWEEN CONCAT(#{searchDate}, '01') AND CONCAT(#{searchDate}, '31') OR c.ACCOUNTS_ED_DT BETWEEN CONCAT(#{searchDate}, '01') AND CONCAT(#{searchDate}, '31')) AND a.USE_AT = 'Y'
/* 협력사 조건 */ AND c.COOPERATOR_ID IN ( SELECT COOPERATOR_ID FROM RD_COOPERATOR WHERE REGISTRATION_SN = #{schIhidNum} )
ORDER BY a.CREAT_DT DESC
